trends: There have been 97 other sightings in Miami
There were no other sightings in Miami on or around December 25th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside smoking a joint. And I was like wow WTF! Santa? (Cause I heard some commotion on my nieghbors roof). I looked and this fat guy was riding in a sled pulled by some deers with antlers. Than he sprinkled some magic dust and a lighter fell at my feet. And than I was like thanks "dude"! Than I went inside and passed out. I told my wife but she doesnt believe me.
